execution_quality: The agent did not provide substantive response or analysis, allowing the user to continue developing their thoughts.
work_category: Exploratory discussion - user articulating challenges and pain points in their current note-taking and zettelkasten practices.
summary: This was a user-led exploration of their knowledge management pain points. The agent provided minimal intervention, enabling the user to articulate their actual challenges (orphan note connections, literature note capture, note utility) rather than responding to surface-level questions.
follow_up_pattern: User continued elaborating on their specific challenges with note-taking workflows, building toward a concrete request.
